snippet: Thousands of couples are expected to declare their everlasting love in Las Vegas on Wednesday, 12/12/12 — the last such triple-date likely to occur in their lifetimes.
abstract: Thousands of couples plan to get married in Las Vegas on December 12, 2012, hoping that the alignment of month, day and year will bring them luck; other such dates, including 7-7-7 and 11-11-11, have seen a similar outpouring.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of couples are expected to declare their everlasting love in Las Vegas on Wednesday, 12/12/12 — the last such triple-date likely to occur in their lifetimes.

headline.seo: For Las Vegas Weddings, 12/12/12 Is a Date With a Built-In Reminder
headline.main: For Vegas Weddings, a Date With a Built-In Reminder
headline.print_headline: For Las Vegas Weddings, a Date With a Built-In Reminder
